title: some sort of blackletter I think. I know it's custom, but something close?
author: chili

comments.content:
Letters similar to the lower case are found in a variety of blackletter fonts including Engravers Old English [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/engravers-old-english-mt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725185931/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/engravers-old-english-mt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/engravers-old-english-mt/") which also has a similar \_A\_ , if you clip off the little flag on the lhs stroke. The \_O\_ is an enlarged \_o\_.  
Don
